mapper.select: select lastAttendDate from attend where userID = #{userID} order by lastAttendDate desc limit 1;
mapper.update: update attend set lastAttendDate = #{lastAttendDate} where userID = #{userID}
mapper.select: select * from attend LEFT JOIN user on attend.userID = user.userID where left(attendDate,10) = #{date}
mapper.update: update attend set content = #{content} where attendUID = #{attendUID}
